titleStmt.title: The foure cardinall-vertues of a Carmelite-fryar observed by Sir Edvvard Dering, knight and baronet ; and by him sent backe againe to their author Simon Stocke, alias Father Simons, alias Iohn Hunt, alias Anonymus Eremita.
titleStmt.author: Dering, Edward, Sir, 1598-1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Raworth for Richard Whitaker ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
